entries.title: OutputBag thread-safety documentation incomplete
entries.description: The documentation states that write() is thread-safe due to asyncio.Lock(), but does not clearly document which read operations are safe and which are not. This ambiguity could lead developers to incorrectly assume all operations are protected.
entries.impact: Developers may write code that reads from OutputBag during concurrent writes, potentially encountering inconsistent state.
entries.recommendation: Add a section to the OutputBag documentation explicitly stating which methods are thread-safe and which require external synchronization.
